Title: Binding from Two Works of Sa`di: The Rose Garden (Gulistan) and The Orchard (Bustan)
Description: Walters manuscript W.619 is bound in an original leather binding (with a flap). The binding has dentelle-style decorated boards and doublures of brown leather with gold-painted filigree work on a multi-colored ground of blue, green, red, and black.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Original Binding; Iran; Literature -- Poetry; Literature -- Prose
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
